div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1136 Khortitsa Island, in the city of Zapo- rozh'e, Ukraine, 1929 Burial: late 2nd cent. B.C.? Contents: 11+ AE Amasia: 2 AE (as RGA I.1, suppl. C, 19) Amisus: 5 AE (as RGA I.1, pl. 7, 7 [2]; unc. [3]) Gaziura: 1 AE (as RGA I.1, pl. 12, 13) Taulara: 1 AE Pergamum: 1 AE Disposition: museum material lost during war Zograph, Ol'viia 1940, p. 295 â€ Dobrovol's'kii, Arkheologiia 7 (Kiev, 1952), p. 87, no. 94 (in Ukrainian)
